Washingtonians will not be intimidated when it comes to voting. We know that voting rights are guaranteed by our Constitution, and Washington state’s vote-by-mail is safe and secure.

Thank you for supporting our voting rights.  We'll need to be vigilant and careful to prevent Trump from interfering with free and fair elections.  Can he tell or force the Postmasters to intercept mail destined for the ballot processing centers?  What other tricks could they pull?

If the State says that I can render my election votes via USPS, then the fed gov't can STFU, adhere to the constitutional States' rights, and stop trying to meddle! A State is NOT *the Fed's agent*, but a sovereign entity in itself.

posts.text:
Americans have the right to express their views without being killed. We should know that we are upholding civil liberties.

The Department of Homeland Security and ICE should be investigated.

My speech on the Senate floor ⬇️

replies.text: That will not get ICE or CBP off the streets. Get them off the streets and then investigate to see if these departments are in any way redeemable.
Maria bombs children

ICE should be removed from existence.

Anything less will get us killed.

You are completely missing the moment.

Please resign, or tell this WA voter his recall options to see you immediately removed from power. 
Before you kill us all.
you should have STOPPED the genocide in Gaza, but you didn't. This is KARMA.

You are the first politician I have heard state that it is the ENTIRETY of DHS that should be investigated. That should be the MINIMUM. DHS has not served this country well since its inception by George Bush the Junior (aka the Shrub) on a night after 9/11 had happened. DHS should be dismantled.
Investigating is fine. But ICE need to be disbanded and abolished. They are a criminal organization and I refuse to have my tax dollars funding them in any capacity.

Senator, SCHUMER MUST GO. We need someone who cares as minority leader. We need someone who will fight. We need someone who does not see Federal troops invading US cities & brutalizing everyone they can reach as normal. His tepid response is getting more people hurt and killed. Abolish ICE.
As a Washingtonian, please fight as hard as you can. It’s not just about policy changes and more training etc, it’s a moral moment. We have to stop this evil, not compromise with it.

I'm a Washingtonian, in Vancouver. I want ICE defunded 1st, then abolish the entire rotten agency. Take some of that funding and hire thousands of judges  lawyers and clerks to handle the backlog of immigration cases so people can get documentation they've been waiting years for!
Investigated doesn't do shit, and you know it.
Thank you for recommending that Homeland Security and ICS should be investigated.
No more money for them! As soon as possible it needs to be abolished!
Investigate and abolish
Edit* ICE should be abolished. ICE agents should be investigated and those who killed or harmed people should be prosecuted.

I’m standing strong against efforts to undermine our voting system. Democracies don't grow on trees. They need to be protected, defended, and fought for. My letter to AG Bondi ⬇️

Completely out of her league and depth.
Pathetic in her inability to even process, much less react to, the events of the day.
Sad.

Thank you Sen. Cantwell.  Keep our votes safe!!
Our free and fair elections are the only thing to get us out of this horrible mess we are in. Elections in 26 and 28 will save our democracy .
Keep it up!

You are on the front lines, Senator Cantwell. Our U.S. Senate will be remembered in history for how you do or don’t act to fight for America. So much is at stake. Maybe you didn’t sign up for dark days like these, but you are positioned to effect the most change. Fight for the rule of law.

Keep denying this regimes illegal and anti-constitutional demands and KEEP OUR VOTER DATA FROM THIS ROGUE GOVERNMENT. And Senator, starve private prison industry out.

"Insanity: doing the same thing over and over and expecting different results"

Abolish DHS, CBP, and ICE. Impeach, convict, remove. Complicity now means accountability later.

Keep it up, Senator! Your job and the decisions you make are more consequential than ever. Our republic relies on your grit and action. We will have your back if you continue to have the backs of those who will help you fight for our democracy. Thank you!
